query:
UPDATE products SET name = 'Eastern Ancient Wisdom Text Pendant', description = 'A sacred pendant inscribed with ancient Eastern wisdom texts, blessed through the traditional consecration rituals of Mount Wutai, one of China's Four Great Buddhist Mountains and a UNESCO World Heritage Site. This profound piece carries the spiritual power of timeless teachings, infused with energy by master monks.

**Spiritual Significance**

This pendant bears sacred texts that have guided spiritual seekers for millennia, embodying the accumulated wisdom of Eastern philosophy and Buddhist teachings. Each character carries vibrational energy that resonates with higher consciousness. Through ancient blessing ceremonies, senior monks at Mount Wutai channel divine energy into the inscribed texts, transforming this pendant into a portable sanctuary of spiritual protection and enlightenment.

**Consecration Ritual**

Within the hallowed temples of Mount Wutai, master monks perform intensive blessing ceremonies to infuse this pendant with profound spiritual essence. Through rhythmic chanting of the very texts inscribed upon it, deep meditation, and the invocation of wisdom deities, the pendant becomes a living transmission of ancient knowledge. This consecration activates the spiritual power dormant within the sacred characters, creating a talisman of protection, wisdom, and spiritual awakening.

**Design & Craftsmanship**

Expertly crafted with meticulous attention to calligraphic detail, this pendant features authentic ancient wisdom texts rendered in traditional script. The artistry honors centuries of spiritual tradition while creating a wearable piece of sacred art. Premium materials ensure the pendant preserves both its physical beauty and its energetic potency, serving as a lasting connection to timeless wisdom.

**Who Should Wear This**

- Spiritual practitioners seeking daily connection to ancient wisdom
- Students of Eastern philosophy and Buddhist teachings
- Those desiring protection through sacred text and divine blessing
- Individuals on a path of spiritual awakening and self-cultivation
- Anyone drawn to the transformative power of sacred language

May this blessed pendant serve as your constant companion on the spiritual path, illuminating your journey with ancient wisdom and protecting you under the guardianship of enlightened masters.' WHERE id = 510049;
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway04.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 2vUuSS4u8JGEyYT.root --database 8WruFPRUxPMzzwD4ZeeUDg --execute UPDATE products SET name = 'Eastern Ancient Wisdom Text Pendant', description = 'A sacred pendant inscribed with ancient Eastern wisdom texts, blessed through the traditional consecration rituals of Mount Wutai, one of China's Four Great Buddhist Mountains and a UNESCO World Heritage Site.
